title: Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna
writer: Karan Johar, Shibani Bathija, Niranjan Iyengar
short_cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Abhishek Bachchan, Rani Mukerji, Preity Zinta, Kiron Kher, Arjun Rampal
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Abhishek Bachchan, Rani Mukerji, Preity Zinta, Kiron Kher, Arjun Rampal

desc: Unhappy in their respective marriages, an ex-footballer and a teacher find true love in each other, but guilt, jealousy and tragedy cloud their affair.
